rules.natural: If the green bond receives approval from the regulatory body, then the conservation project becomes operational in the protected area

If the conservation project team possesses financial skills, then should the conservation project demonstrate business model viability, the conservation project becomes operational in the protected area
The conservation project passes the technical committee review or the conservation project passes the ethics board review

rules.prover9_expression: passes_review(conservation_project, ethics_board) -> (qualifies_for(conservation_project, funding_program) -> (possesses_team(conservation_project, legal_expertise) | possesses_team(conservation_project, financial_skills)))
rules.natural: When the conservation project passes the ethics board review, then if the conservation project qualifies for the funding program, the conservation project team possesses legal expertise or the conservation project team possesses financial skills

rules.prover9_expression: faces_opposition(conservation_project, industry_groups) | (passes_review(conservation_project, technical_committee) -> (qualifies_for(conservation_project, funding_program) -> (possesses_team(conservation_project, legal_expertise) | possesses_team(conservation_project, financial_skills))))
rules.natural: The conservation project faces opposition from industry groups or if the conservation project passes the technical committee review, then provided that the conservation project qualifies for the funding program, the conservation project team possesses legal expertise or the conservation project team possesses financial skills
The regulatory body activates the fast track procedure or the conservation project does not trigger the emergency protocol review
If the green bond meets the sustainability standards criteria, then the green bond receives approval from the regulatory body
If the conservation project gains media attention from national news, then the conservation project receives public support from local communities
The conservation project gains media attention from national news or the conservation project demonstrates climate impact urgency

Under the condition that the conservation project demonstrates climate impact urgency, then if the conservation project meets the urgent environmental threat criteria, the regulatory body grants immediate approval to the conservation project
If the conservation project secures funding from private investors, then the conservation project becomes operational in the protected area
If the conservation project secures funding from government grants, then the conservation project becomes operational in the protected area
If the green bond passes the environmental audit assessment, then the green bond receives approval from the regulatory body
If the financial product requires modification under the legal framework, then the financial product does not comply with the new regulations
If the regulatory body initiates the impact study process, then the regulatory body completes the impact study

Provided that the conservation project team possesses legal expertise, then if the conservation project demonstrates business model viability, the conservation project becomes operational in the protected area
Should the green bond neither meet the sustainability standards criteria nor pass the environmental audit assessment, then the financial product requires modification under the legal framework

rules.prover9_expression: -(achieves_certification(conservation_project, international_standard) -> (encounters_legal_challenges(conservation_project, competing_interests) | (secures_funding(conservation_project, private_investors) | secures_funding(conservation_project, government_grants)))) -> faces_international_scrutiny(conservation_project, watchdog_groups)
rules.natural: If it is not the case that the conservation project achieving international standard certification leads to the conservation project encountering legal challenges from competing interests or the conservation project securing funding from private investors or the conservation project securing funding from government grants, then the conservation project faces international scrutiny from watchdog groups

When it is not true that the financial product requiring modification under the legal framework results in the financial product complying with the new regulations, then the regulatory body initiates the impact study process

rules.prover9_expression: -(-(achieves_certification(conservation_project, international_standard) -> (encounters_legal_challenges(conservation_project, competing_interests) | (secures_funding(conservation_project, private_investors) | secures_funding(conservation_project, government_grants)))) -> -faces_international_scrutiny(conservation_project, watchdog_groups)) -> undergoes_investigation(conservation_project, global_authority)
rules.natural: Provided that it is not the case that the failure of the conservation project achieving international standard certification to lead to the conservation project encountering legal challenges from competing interests or the conservation project securing funding from private investors or the conservation project securing funding from government grants results in the conservation project not facing international scrutiny from watchdog groups, then the conservation project undergoes investigation by the global authority

rules.prover9_expression: -(-(achieves_certification(conservation_project, international_standard) -> (encounters_legal_challenges(conservation_project, competing_interests) | (secures_funding(conservation_project, private_investors) | secures_funding(conservation_project, government_grants)))) -> -faces_international_scrutiny(conservation_project, watchdog_groups)) -> -undergoes_investigation(conservation_project, global_authority)
